channel.title: Unseen two NEEDED Reworks
channel.description:
> Herbalist Rework > > Passives: > Remedy Studies - same old same. > > Day Abilities: > Potion of Clarity - Cure an unseen member from bleeding or poisoning.(2 uses) > > > Night Abilities: > Drug - if the target was not unseen, and not poisened or bleeding they will be told they were attacked but healed(like normal), but if they were poisened or bled it will say they will healed from it but they will still die after the two days.(3 uses) > > Defile - Same as normal, but if used on an unseen member will instead make them that selected class if they die, but if the unseen member does not die in two days it will revert back to normal.(2 uses)
> Alcoholic Rework > > Passives > I am Liquor - Same > Royal Blood - Same > > Day Abilities: > Disillusion Spirit - Make a player believe they were poisoned.(1 use) > >Drunk - Make a player drunk meaning they cannot use their day abilities they will not be told and they will still loose the ability if they try to use it. If the player you selected was the Prince it will have no effect (3 uses) > Night Abilities: > Happy Hour - same >Debauchery - Same

item.title: Unseen two NEEDED Reworks
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:

Read full topic

item.title: Unseen two NEEDED Reworks
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
invoker:

basically to confuse bd so if somebody found out who the assasin was you could use defile on them making them appear the class they claimed which in turn would confuse bd and make them turn on sheriff

Well it sure confused me.

Read full topic

item.title: Unseen two NEEDED Reworks
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
invoker:

Drunk - Make a player drunk meaning they cannot use their day abilities they will not be told and they will still loose the ability if they try to use it. If the player you selected was the Prince it will have no effect (3 uses)

Since Invoker has a day ability that disables King’s day abilities, wouldn’t it be more consistent to make this a day ability also?

Read full topic

item.title: Unseen two NEEDED Reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
invoker:

Defile - Same as normal, but if used on an unseen member will instead make them that selected class if they die, but if the unseen member does not die in two days it will revert back to normal.(2 uses)

What?

Read full topic

item.title: Unseen two NEEDED Reworks
item.dc:creator: invoker
item.description:
Herbalist Rework

Passives:
Remedy Studies - same old same.

Day Abilities:
Potion of Clarity - Cure an unseen member from bleeding or poisoning.(2 uses)

Night Abilities:
Drug - if the target was not unseen, and not poisened or bleeding they will be told they were attacked but healed(like normal), but if they were poisened or bled it will say they will healed from it but they will still die after the two days.(3 uses)

Defile - Same as normal, but if used on an unseen member will instead make them that selected class if they die, but if the unseen member does not die in two days it will revert back to normal.(2 uses)

Alcoholic Rework

Passives
I am Liquor - Same
Royal Blood - Same

Day Abilities:
Disillusion Spirit - Make a player believe they were poisoned.(1 use)

Drunk - Make a player drunk meaning they cannot use their day abilities they will not be told and they will still loose the ability if they try to use it. If the player you selected was the Prince it will have no effect (3 uses)
Night Abilities:
Happy Hour - same
Debauchery - Same

Read full topic
